data.actual_result: The underline is the colour of the role before highlighted
data.expected_result: The underline should be the same color or white as the rest of the name
data.short_description: When you highlight someone's name in a server the underline stays the role colour whereas the rest is highlighted
data.steps_to_repro: - Give a user a role and must be a coloured role - Highlight/hold down left click and select a user with a role - Move your mouse away from the highlighted member - Move your mouse over the name and observe it's a role colour of the server member and not highlighted blue (or grey if you click on another page)
